rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious foyer to welcome family and guests, following Vastu principles by aligning the main door in the north-east direction.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-plan living area designed for family gatherings and social events with Bohemian decor elements.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Spacious kitchen designed for a joint family, featuring both modern appliances and traditional decor elements.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: A utility space for additional storage and household chores. Adheres to Vastu by being located in a less prominent area.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A well-appointed master bedroom with Bohemian aesthetics and ample natural light from a south-facing window as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A guest room with comfortable amenities and decor to reflect a Bohemian charm.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: Placed in the north-east corner as per Vastu, ensuring auspicious entry.

openings.name: Courtyard Access
openings.description: A central opening to access the courtyard which is designed for family activities and natural light distribution.

rooms.name: Children's Bedroom
rooms.description: A combined bedroom space for children and/or extended family members with a playful Bohemian design.

rooms.name: Library/Study Room
rooms.description: A quiet study area integrated into the Bohemian theme to offer a space for reading and contemplation.

rooms.name: Additional Bedroom
rooms.description: An extra bedroom catering to joint family requirements, designed with flexible partitions.

openings.name: Staircase
openings.description: A split-level staircase connecting the ground and first floors, designed to optimize space in a joint family cottage.

openings.name: Balcony Access
openings.description: Access to an open balcony that provides a view of the courtyard, adhering to Vastu by allowing natural light and air circulation.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A well-designed bathroom with separate partitions and natural ventilation, following local building norms.

rooms.name: Service Areas
rooms.description: Small service rooms for utilities, aligning with Vastu by being located away from the main living spaces.

openings.name: Service Access
openings.description: A dedicated opening to service areas for easy access and maintenance.
